Test Cases: Manager/ Customer can make a deposite after entering valid data
Expected Result: The manager/ customer successfully make a deposit

Test Cases: Manager can make a deposit if the account no associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Account No" associated with the manager
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the manager
Expected Result: Manager can successfully make a deposit

Test Cases: Customer can't make a deposit if the account no associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Account No" not associated with the customer
Expected Result: An error message "Account does not exist" must shown

Test Cases: Customer can make a deposit if the account no associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Account No" not associated with the customer
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the customer
Expected Result: Customer can successfully make a deposit
